name: vuepress-theme-cool-starter
description: A cool theme that has integrated some vue components, charts via charts, and markdown based diagrams plantuml and mermaid.
author: FriendlyUser <davidli012345@gmail.com>

scripts.docs:build: set VUEPRESS_BASE=/tdm3-docs/ && npx vuepress build docs
scripts.dev: set VUEPRESS_BASE=/tdm3-docs/ && npx vuepress dev docs

devComments.vuepress: Install vuepress to test run plugins. According to https://github.com/vuejs/vuepress/issues/1608
